snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include common elements in the most popular pictures on Pinterest and theories about how an eagerly awaited TV show...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include common elements in the most popular pictures on Pinterest and theories about how an eagerly awaited TV show remained unseen until Netflix unveiled it.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Pinterest Formula and 'Arrested Development' Security
